special_powers.name: TEAM LEADER
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a keyword Batman possesses.  All friendly characters with that keyword and a lower point value can use the Batman Ally team ability while Batman is on the map.

special_powers.name: I WILL NOT FAIL GOTHAM
special_powers.description: When Batman is marked with one action token, modify his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: BATMAN
special_powers.description: Give Bruce Wayne a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with DKR #001, BM #001, or BM #053A on its orange starting line.  This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: CEO, BATMAN INCORPORATED
special_powers.description: Bruce Wayne can use Leadership, Perplex, and Shape Change.  When he uses Perplex, he can only target friendly characters.

special_powers.name: ON THE UP AND UP
special_powers.description: Arkham Asylum Guard can use the Police team ability.

special_powers.name: LOCKDOWN
special_powers.description: Arkham Asylum Guard can use the Capture ability, but can only have one captive at any time.

special_powers.name: ON THE TAKE
special_powers.description: Arkham Asylum Guard can use the Underworld team ability. Opposing characters that share a keyword with Arkham Asylum Guard subtract 2 from their d6 roll when breaking away from him.

special_powers.name: ROLLING WITH THE PUNCHLINE
special_powers.description: When Mastermind is used to deal damage to The Joker Thug reduce damage dealt by 1.

special_powers.name: GOT YER BACK, BOSS
special_powers.description: Adjacent friendly characters with higher point value can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: MORPH: BEAST BOY
special_powers.description: Give Beast Boy a move action that deals no pushing damage. After the action resolves, replace him with any character with this trait but a different collector number on the same click number.

special_powers.name: GRAB MY FIN!
special_powers.description: When Beast Boy occupies water terrain and uses the Move and Attack ability, his attack value is not modified by -2 for the attack.

special_powers.name: THE FLIPPERS AREN'T JUST CUTE, THEY'RE QUICK!
special_powers.description: Beast Boy can use Super Senses. When he occupies water terrain, he can also use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: MINION
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, Hired Henchman can be declared a minion of any friendly character with which he shares a keyword, who is considered the Boss until the end of the game; If Hired Henchman is within 8 squares of the Boss, Hired Henchman is a wild card but can only use the Boss's team abilities.

special_powers.name: LOOKIN GOOD
special_powers.description: When the Boss is 6 or fewer squares away, modify Hired Henchman's attack and defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: LOOK WHAT THE BOSS GAME ME
special_powers.description: When Hired Henchman is adjecant to the Boss, he can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: MINION
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, Hired Henchman can be declared a minion of any friendly character with which he shares a keyword, who is considered the Boss until the end of the game; If Hired Henchman is within 8 squares of the Boss, Hired Henchman is a wild card but can only use the Boss's team abilities.

special_powers.name: LOOKIN GOOD
special_powers.description: When the Boss is 6 or fewer squares away, modify Hired Henchman's attack and defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: LOOK WHAT THE BOSS GAVE ME
special_powers.description: When Hired Henchman is adjacent to the Boss, he can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: WE LEAVE THE MASKS ON
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Stealth. When Catwoman is adjacent to a friendly character possessing the Batman Ally team ability, she can use Plasticity and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: MISDIRECTION
special_powers.description: Catwoman can use Outwit. Give Catwoman a free action and remove an action token from an adjacent opposing character. If she does, she may place an action token on any other opposing character within 6 squares and line of fire.

special_powers.name: PROCURER OF FINE ARTIFACTS
special_powers.description: Selina Kyle can use Stealth. Give Selina Kyle a free action when she is adjacent to a character with a relic on their character card and you may roll a d6 that cannot be re-rolled. If the result of that roll is one of the numbers required to pick up that relic, place the relic on Selina Kyle's character card. Selina Kyle is not limited to rolling once per game for each relic.

special_powers.name: YOU CAN'T TAKE THE CIRCUS OUT OF THE BOY
special_powers.description: Nightwing can use Charge, Flurry, and Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: SUIT TASER
special_powers.description: Nightwing can use Incapacitate and Quake.

special_powers.name: I KNOW BRUCE'S TRICKS
special_powers.description: When Red Robin is within 8 squares of a character that possesses the Batman Ally team ability, he can use Stealth.

special_powers.name: MY WINGS WILL PROTECT ME
special_powers.description: Red Robin can use Energy Shield/Deflection.  When Red Robin is the target of a ranged combat attack, he can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: SHROUDED IN SHADOW
special_powers.description: Immediately after the resolution of an attack where an opposing character takes damage from an attack by Blackbat, she can use Smoke Cloud as a free action.

special_powers.name: ONE AGAINST THE TRIADS
special_powers.description: Blackbat can use Quake; when she does and rolls doubles, hit character(s) are given an action token.

special_powers.name: QUICKFIRE
special_powers.description: Give Grifter a ranged combat action. After actions resolve, if this power is showing, he may make a second ranged combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: YOU ARE ALL FODDER
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Mastermind, but can only use it to deal damage to characters that have a point value of 50 or less.

special_powers.name: H.A.H.A.D.E.A.T.H.H.A.H.A.
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Steal Energy. Whenever The Joker is healed using Steal Energy, if the attack roll was doubles, heal the Joker of 2 damage instead.

special_powers.name: THIS IS WHERE YOUR SOUL DIES
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Exploit Weakness and Probability Control.

special_powers.name: DIVE INTO BATTLE
special_powers.description: When Nightrunner occupies elevated terrain at the beginning on your turn, modify his speed and attack values by +1 until end of turn.

special_powers.name: ELECTRO-MAGNA-GOOPERANGS
special_powers.description: Batgirl can use Energy Explosion as if she had "2 targets"; when she does, hit characters are given an action token.

special_powers.name: IN CONTACT WITH PROXY
special_powers.description: Batgirl can use Outwit.  When she does, she can only target a character within 5 squares.

special_powers.name: LEAD BY EXAMPLE
special_powers.description: Give Aaron Cash a free action and modify the attack value of an adjacent friendly character by +1 until the end of the turn when it makes a close combat attack.

special_powers.name: MORPH: BEAST BOY
special_powers.description: Give Beast Boy a move action that deals no pushing damage. After the action resolves, replace him with any character with this trait but a different collector number on the same click number.

special_powers.name: THE LOGAN EXPRESS
special_powers.description: When Beast Boy uses the Carry ability, he can carry up to three characters if they all share a keyword with him.

special_powers.name: PROSTHETIC WEAPON
special_powers.description: KGBeast can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.  When he does, if the result of the d6 roll is 1 or 2, the damage is penetrating damage; If the result is 5 or 6, his damage value becomes 4 and is locked.

special_powers.name: LONG DISTANCE SNIPER
special_powers.description: If KGBeast occupies hindering terrain, he has a range of 8 and modifies his attack value by +2 when making a ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: SHATTER STOMP
special_powers.description: Thunder can use Quake. When she does, after actions resolve, she may destroy up to three adjacent squares of blocking terrrain.

special_powers.name: GOOD OR EVIL? FLIP A COIN!
special_powers.description: During the beginning of your turn roll a d6. On a result of 1-3 Two-Face possesses Battle Fury and the Batman Enemy team ability and can use Charge and Exploit Weakness until your next turn. On a result of 4-6 Two-Face possesses the Batman Ally team ability and can use Defend, Running Shot, and Support until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BODYGUARD
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose another friendly character to be the Client.  At the end of your turn, if Sasha Bordeaux is within 4 squares and line of fire of the Client, she may be placed adjacent to the Client.

special_powers.name: EXECUTION PROTECTION
special_powers.description: Sasha Bordeaux can use Defend, but only if the attacker is within line of fire.  Sasha Bordeaux modifies her defense value by +1 against close combat attacks.

special_powers.name: OMACTIVATED
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, Black Queen may select a team ability an opposing character can use; that team ability is uncopyable.  Black Queen can't be the target of Incapacitate or Mind Control and modifies her defense by +2 when she is the target of Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: OPTIMIZED TARGETING OPTICS AND INFRARED VISION
special_powers.description: Black Queen can use Running Shot.  Black Queen ignores opposing character's Stealth.

special_powers.name: BRUTE STRENGTH
special_powers.description: Maul can use Super Strength; when he moves through a square occupied by or adjacent to a non-held object, he may choose to destroy the object.

special_powers.name: GETTING..TOO...BIG
special_powers.description: Maul can use Impervious and Regeneration.

special_powers.name: HALF-TITANTHROPE
special_powers.description: Maul has the "giant" damage symbol and can use Close Combat Expert.

special_powers.name: FLYING HIGH AGAIN
special_powers.description: Batgirl can use Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: I STILL HAVE A FEW TRICKS IN MY BELT
special_powers.description: Batgirl can use Incapacitate and Smoke Cloud. When she uses Incapacitate and places a second action token on a hit character, the resulting pushing damage can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: I HAVE A THEORY
special_powers.description: Modify defense of opposing characters adjacent to Roy Raymond, Jr. by -1.

special_powers.name: HELLUVA DETECTIVE
special_powers.description: Roy Raymond, Jr. can use Outwit. He can use it normally, or counter a team ability as if it were a power. When he does, all opposing characters that possess the chosen team ability have that team ability countered.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: NIGHTWING/RENEGADE
special_powers.description: Give Dick Grayson a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with BM #008 Nightwing, or BM #101 Renegade on its orange starting line. This power can't be countered.

special_powers.name: DEADLY FORCE IS NOT AN OPTION
special_powers.description: Dick Grayson can use Incapacitate, but only when given a close combat action; immediately after resolving a use of Incapacitate, he may use it again as a free action.

special_powers.name: ENTANGLING HAIR
special_powers.description: Godiva can use Incapacitate. When she does, she can use the Giant Reach ability and may target all opposing characters she can attack with a close combat attack.

special_powers.name: THROWING KNIVES
special_powers.description: Give El Gaucho a ranged combat action to make a ranged combat attack as if he had a range value of 4 and 3 targets and each hit character is dealt 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: FIELD MEDIC, STAGE TRAINING
special_powers.description: Alfred Pennyworth can use Shape Change and Support; when he uses Support, he can treat friendly characters within 4 squares and line of fire as if they were adjacent and increases the damage healed by +1 for each action token on the target.

special_powers.name: BOOM TUBE
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Big Barda a double power action to use Phasing/Teleport as if she had a speed value of 12.  After actions resolve, you may give Big Barda a close combat or ranged combat action as a free action.

special_powers.name: I WILL STAND MY GROUND
special_powers.description: Modify Big Barda's defense value by +1 for each action token assigned to her.

special_powers.name: MEGA-ROD AND MOTHER BOX
special_powers.description: Big Barda can use Penetrating/Psychic Blast and Quake.

special_powers.name: PLANS WITHIN PLANS
special_powers.description: Bad Samaritan can use Mastermind and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TACTICIAN
special_powers.description: Bad Samaritan can use Outwit; when he uses it to counter a power or ability on a target, the same power or ability is also countered on any opposing characters adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: I LIKE POWERFUL MEN
special_powers.description: Poison Ivy can use Mind Control and Stealth. When she uses Mind Control, modify her attack value by +1 and she does not take unavoidable damage from Mind Control.

special_powers.name: POISONOUS VINES
special_powers.description: Poison Ivy can use Poison and Smoke Cloud; immediately after she uses Smoke Cloud, choose one of the hindering terrain markers placed by the power and deal 1 damage to each character occupying or adjacent to it.

special_powers.name: BATTLESUIT
special_powers.description: Rocket Red can use Energy Explosion and Super Strength.

special_powers.name: TWICE-NAMED
special_powers.description: Batwoman can use Flurry. When she does, modify her attack value by -1 if the second attack is made against a target different from the first.

special_powers.name: A BETTER ENEMY
special_powers.description: When Hush uses the Batman Enemy team ability to replace his attack value, modify his attack value by +1 if not already modified by this effect.  Hush ignores the Batman Ally team ability.

special_powers.name: FACE OF WAYNE
special_powers.description: Hush can use Mastermind and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: THE SURGEON CUTS
special_powers.description: Hush can use Exploit Weakness and Support.

special_powers.name: INFILTRATING THE BATMAN FAMILY
special_powers.description: If no friendly characters on the map possess the Batman Ally team ability, Bruce Wayne may use it.

special_powers.name: I WILL STRIKE WAYNE THROUGH THOSE MOST DEAR TO HIM
special_powers.description: Bruce Wayne ignores Stealth.

special_powers.name: BRILLIANT SURGEON.....AFTER TURNING THE KNIFE ON MYSELF
special_powers.description: Bruce Wayne can use Outwit, Shape Change and Support.  When he uses Support, do not subtract 2 from the d6 roll.

special_powers.name: AS THE PARTY REQUIRES
special_powers.description: August General in Iron can use Quake.  When he does, choose a hit opposing character; damage dealt to the chosen character is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: I KNOW YOU AS MYSELF
special_powers.description: Other characters within 4 squares can't use Outwit or Perplex.

special_powers.name: MONSTER MEN SERUM
special_powers.description: Give Hugo Strange a free action to choose an adjacent friendly character.  The chosen character can use Charge, Quake, and Super Strength until the end of your turn.  At the end of your turn, deal the chosen character 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: RED AURA
special_powers.description: Halo can use Energy Explosion; when she does, if the attack roll is doubles, hit characters are given an action token.

special_powers.name: START AT THE BOTTOM
special_powers.description: Opposing characters cannot target Lucius Fox with an attack if it is the first non-free action of the turn.

special_powers.name: AERIAL MANEUVERS
special_powers.description: Batwing can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Toughness.

special_powers.name: BIO-MORPHIC SHIELD
special_powers.description: Warblade can use Toughness.  If he has no action tokens, Warblade can use Barrier as a free action until your next turn, but places up to 2 terrain markers.

special_powers.name: I DO THE PHYSICAL STUFF
special_powers.description: Mr. Unknown can use Leap/Climb; modify his attack value by +1 when he's adjacent to more then one opposing character.

special_powers.name: MR. UNKNOWN IS DEAD-LONG LIVE BATMAN!
special_powers.description: Give Mr. Unknown a free action and choose a friendly adjacent character. That character can use Steal Energy this turn and when it uses Steal Energy and heals, give Mr. Unknown and action token.

special_powers.name: CHAIN LIGHTNING
special_powers.description: Black Lightning can use Energy Explosion, Incapacitate, and Penetrating/Psychic Blast. When he uses Incapacitate, he can use the sharpshooter ability and has "3 targets".

special_powers.name: EARTHSHOCK
special_powers.description: Geo-Force begins the game with the Earthern Fist attached. Give Geo-Force a power action and place the Earthern Fist in an unoccupied square of clear terrain that is within 10 squares, line of fire, and is adjacent to an opposing character; make a close combat attack targeting the adjacent opposing character.  If you hit, the opposing character can't target characters friendly to Geo-Force until the Earthern Fist has been destroyed or reattached. The Earthen Fist is considered a square of blocking terrain. When Geo-Force has no action tokens, you may attach the Earthern Fist to Geo-Force.

special_powers.name: BURNING TOUCH
special_powers.description: Doctor Phosphorous can use Poison but may be given the free action to activate it at any time during your turn.

special_powers.name: NEVER ENDING CHEMICAL REACTION
special_powers.description: Doctor Phosphorus may use Regeneration and Willpower.

special_powers.name: FREEZER BURN
special_powers.description: When Mr. Freeze makes a ranged combat attack, modify his attack value by +1 for each target character.

special_powers.name: A COLD THAT WILL FREEZE YOUR HEART
special_powers.description: Mr. Freeze can use Barrier and Incapacitate. When he uses Barrier, modify his range by +3 and after actions resolve, he may use Incapacitate as a free action targeting all opposing characters adjacent to the blocking terrain markers with a close combat attack.

special_powers.name: STRATEGIC TARGETING
special_powers.description: Mr. Freeze can use Ranged Combat Expert. When he does, he may target multiple characters.

special_powers.name: RUNAWAY REACTOR
special_powers.description: When Socialist Red Guardsman uses Energy Explosion, you may choose that damage dealt to the targets of the attack is penetrating damage, and when he uses Pulse Wave you may choose to have the area of effect be his range value; when you do either, deal him 1 unavoidable damage after the attack resolves.

special_powers.name: FORCED RECONFIGURATION
special_powers.description: When turning dial, if this click is revealed due to damage from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. ReMac can't be given close combat or ranged combat actions. During the beginning of your turn, when any opposing characters are within 3 squares and line of fire, ReMac must be given a free action to use Pulse Wave. If he does, after actions resolve, he is dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: CHLORINE GAS
special_powers.description: Rex Mason can use Phasing/Teleport. When he does and moves 3 squares or fewer, he can use Pulse Wave as a free action with a locked value of 1, no matter how many characters are targeted. Lines of fire are drawn from each square Rex Mason occupied or moved into.

special_powers.name: SKEETS
special_powers.description: Booster Gold has "Duo Attack Symbol".

special_powers.name: THE ADVANTAGE OF TIME TRAVEL
special_powers.description: Booster Gold can use Probability Control. When he uses it for his own attack roll, he may use it again during that attack as long as the rerolled value is higher than the previous ignored value.

special_powers.name: FLOCK OF BATS
special_powers.description: Give Batman a free action to attach an adjacent Flock of Bats to his base or remove an attached Flock of Bats and place it in an adjacent square; when a Flock of Bats is attached, Batman can use its special power, but do not return the flock to your starting area after using it.  If Batman is KOd with a Flock of Bats attached, place any attached Flock of Bats in an adjacent square before removing him from the game.

special_powers.name: ALLIES IN DARKNESS
special_powers.description: The Caped Crusader may begin the game with a Flock of Bats attached to his base at no additional cost.  While there is at least one Flock of Bats attached, The Caped Crusader can use Super Senses.  You may give the attached Flock of Bats a move action to detach and move on the map.  When The Caped Crusader has less than 3 Flock of Bats attached, a friendly Flock of Bats may end its move in the same square as him; if it does, attach that Flock of Bats to The Caped Crusader.  If The Caped Crusader is KOd with a Flock of Bats attached, place any attached Flock of Bats in an adjacent square before removing him from the game.

special_powers.name: I SHALL BECOME A BAT
special_powers.description: Give The Caped Crusader a free action to switch places with any friendly unattached Flock of Bats on the map, even if the Flock of Bats didn't start the game attached to The Caped Crusader.

special_powers.name: THE BATS OBEY ME
special_powers.description: Give The Caped Crusader a power action.  Give up to 3 unattached Flocks of Bats move actions as free actions.

special_powers.name: MIND LOCK
special_powers.description: Voodoo can use Mind Control. When she does, modify her attack value by +2 and the target character is not required to be within range or line of fire if she previously hit it with Mind Control.

special_powers.name: THE SIGHT
special_powers.description: Voodoo and adjacent friendly characters ignore opposing characters' use of Shape Change and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: TELEPORT MODE
special_powers.description: When The Insider has no tokens, he can use Phasing/Teleport as a free action. If he does, he can't be given a non-free action this turn.

special_powers.name: DANGEROUS BUT DETERMINED
special_powers.description: After an action resolves in which Batman KOs an opposing character, heal him of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: KNIGHT'S MOVE
special_powers.description: After an attack targeting Omega Batman resolves, if he has no action tokens on him you may place Omega Batman in any square adjacent to the attacker.

special_powers.name: GOTCHA
special_powers.description: When Omega Batman is the only friendly character on the map, he can use Probability Control.

special_powers.name: CARDINAL CONFIGURATION
special_powers.description: When Omega Batman causes a target character to take damage, you may deal damage equal to the number of action tokens on the target to an opposing character adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: ULTIMATE CONDITION
special_powers.description: Omega Batman can use Outwit and Perplex. Give Omega Batman a double power action; all powers and combat abilities of opposing characters adjacent to Omega Batman are countered until your next turn.

special_powers.name: USING MY OWN METHODS
special_powers.description: When a friendly character is KO'd by an opposing character's attack, remove an action token from Batman.

special_powers.name: ANYTHING I THINK OF
special_powers.description: Batman can use Barrier, Energy Explosion, Incapacitate, and Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: IT IMPARTS SPEED
special_powers.description: Batman can use Charge and Flurry.

special_powers.name: SMALL, BUT ANNOYING
special_powers.description: Flock of Bats can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: SHADOW OF THE BATS
special_powers.description: Give Flock of Bats a power action; until the beginning of your next turn, squares adjacent to this Flock of Bats are hindering for line of fire purposes.  When this power is used, at the beginning of your next turn, place this Flock of Bats in your starting area.

special_powers.name: SMALL, BUT ANNOYING
special_powers.description: Flock of Bats can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: I SHALL BECOME...
special_powers.description: Give Flock of Bats a power action; until the beginning of your next turn, characters adjacent to this Flock of Bats who can use Stealth modify their attack value by +1.  When this power is used, at the beginning of your next turn, place this Flock of Bats in your starting area.

special_powers.name: SMALL, BUT ANNOYING
special_powers.description: Flock of Bats can't use the Carry ability.

special_powers.name: COWARDLY AND SUPERSTITUOUS
special_powers.description: Give Flock of Bats a power action; until the beginning of your next turn, before any opposing character adjacent to it may be given a power action, roll a d6 and on a result of 1-3 place an action token on that character.  If the character may still be given a non-free action, it must continue to be given it.  When this power is used, at the beginning of your next turn, place this Flock of Bats in your starting area.

special_powers.name: DOUBLE TROUBLE
special_powers.description: When Nightwing and Batgirl use the Duo Attack ability, modify their attack value by +1; also modify their damage value by +1 if they're marked with an action token.

special_powers.name: COMPLEMENTARY COMBAT SKILLS
special_powers.description: When Nightwing and Batgirl use the Duo Attack ability, they may use Flurry as a free action instead of each attack.

special_powers.name: STICK TO THE SHADOWS, BATGIRL!
special_powers.description: When Nightwing and Batgirl end their non-free action at a different elevation from where they started the turn, after the action resolves they can immediately use Smoke Cloud as a free action.

special_powers.name: WATCHING YOUR BACKSIDE
special_powers.description: Nightwing and Batgirl can use Combat Reflexes and Super Senses.

special_powers.name: DEATHSTROKE'S DARK KNIGHT
special_powers.description: Renegade can use Leadership. Give Renegade a free action to modify adjacent friendly character's damage value by +1 until the end of the turn.

special_powers.name: UNDERCOVER HERO
special_powers.description: Matches Malone can use Perplex and Shape Change. When he uses Perplex, he can only modify opposing characters' combat values.

special_powers.name: ALTER EGO: BATMAN
special_powers.description: Give Matches Malone a power action that deals no pushing damage and replace this character with BM #001, or BM #053A on its orange starting line. This power cannot be countered.

special_powers.name: SPIRIT OF TLANO
special_powers.description: The Batman of Zur-En-Arrh can use Super Strength and Toughness.

special_powers.name: EMERGENCY BACKUP PERSONALITY
special_powers.description: The Batman of Zur-En-Arrh can use Probability Control; when he does, if the final attack result is a hit and is doubles, heal him of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: THE BAT-RADIA SEES THROUGH ALL DECEPTION
special_powers.description: The Batman of Zur-En-Arrh ignores other characters' Stealth. Characters targeted by The Batman of Zur-En-Arrh can't use Mastermind, Shape Change, and Super Senses for that action.

special_powers.name: ALCHEMICAL BLADES
special_powers.description: Azrael can use Quake; when he hits more than one character and the attack roll is doubles, one hit characters may be given an action token and another hit character may be dealt penetrating damage; the two must be different characters.

special_powers.name: CARRY YOU TO SAFETY
special_powers.description: When Batman uses the Carry ability to carry a character, he can't make an attack during that action.

special_powers.name: MILLIONS TO BUY ANYTHING OR ANYONE
special_powers.description: Bruce Wayne can use Telekinesis but cannot use it to make attacks with objects.

special_powers.name: HUSH IN DISGUISE
special_powers.description: Bruce Wayne can use Blades/Claws/Fangs, Poison, and has "2 targets".

special_powers.name: I WORK FOR YOU
special_powers.description: When forces are revealed, one friendly character is selected as the Boss.  Only one Boss may be selected per force and the Boss may not possess this trait.

special_powers.name: THESE GOONS ARE A DIME A DOZEN
special_powers.description: When Hired Goon reaches a countdown click, stop turning the dial and remove Hired Goon from the map.  When Hired Goon is not on the map, turn dial once to the right at the start of your turn.  When a non-countdown click is revealed return Hired Goon to the map in your starting area.  When the Boss is KO'd, all countdown clicks become KO clicks.  Victory points are awarded for this character when he is KO'd or each time the red line is crossed.

special_powers.name: STAR CROSSED LOVERS
special_powers.description: When Catwoman is adjacent to a character named Batman, both characters can use Support (but only to target each other).

special_powers.name: CAN'T HELP MYSELF
special_powers.description: During the beginning of your turn, if Catwoman is adjacent to a relic or any character with a relic on its character card, remove that relic from the game.

special_powers.name: TRAINED ACROBAT
special_powers.description: Nightwing can use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: BLACK OPS
special_powers.description: Red Robin can use Running Shot and Stealth.

special_powers.name: HARLEY'S MY GIRL
special_powers.description: If a friendly Harley Quinn took damage from an attack since your last turn, you may give The Joker a free action. If you do, place The Joker adjacent to a character that caused Harley Quinn to take damage and target that character with a close combat attack. Harley Quinn is dealt one unavoidable damage. If Harley was KO'ed during your opponent's last turn, The Joker's attack value becomes 12 until the end of your turn.

special_powers.name: SO UNPREDICTABLE
special_powers.description: The Joker can use Probability Control but only during your turn.

special_powers.name: MY PUDDIN'
special_powers.description: Harley Quinn can use Poison if a character named Joker or The Joker is on your force.

special_powers.name: MYSTERIOUS ALLY
special_powers.description: (25 points) Batgirl possesses the Justice League keyword.

special_powers.name: REBORN AS ORACLE
special_powers.description: Batgirl possesses Earthbound/Neutralized and the Justice League Team Ability.

special_powers.name: EXPLOSIVE BATARANGS
special_powers.description: Batgirl can use Energy Explosion as if she had "2 targets".

special_powers.name: DUAL-PERSONALITY: HARVEY DENT
special_powers.description: Two-Face can use the Batman Ally and Police team abilities.  At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6.  On a result of 4-6, replace this character with bm #210b Two-Face on the current click number plus 6.

special_powers.name: DUAL-PERSONALITY: TWO-FACE
special_powers.description: Two-Face can use the Batman Enemy and Underworld team abilities.  At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6.  On a result of 1-3, replace this character with bm #210a Two-Face on the current click number minus 6.

Character can use Barrier.  When it does, it can use Incapacitate as a free action targeting all opposing characters adjacent to a blocking terrain marker placed by this character with a close combat attack.
This character can use Battle Fury and Super Strength.
Give this character a power action.  Each friendly Flock of Bats may be given a move action as a free action; halve its speed value for the action.

special_powers.name: BAT-TRACER
special_powers.description: Batmobile modifies its attack value by +1 for each time the targeted character has taken damage from an attack this turn.

special_powers.name: TARGETED EMP
special_powers.description: Batmobile can use Outwit, but can only target characters with the Armor, Robot or Vehicle keyword.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: FAMILIAR CONTROLS
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Batman Ally team ability or Batman Family keyword.  When Batmobile replaces its combat values with the combat values of its pilot, modify any replaced combat value by +1.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: BATCOMPUTER
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Alfred Pennyworth, Batman, Red Robin, Robin, or Nightwing.  Batmobile can use any standard damage power possessed by its pilot.

special_powers.name: LOOK OUT! IT'S BATMAN!
special_powers.description: Batmobile can use Charge and the Ram ability.  When it uses the Ram ability, modify the attack value of up to three hit characters by -1 until the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: TARGETED EMP
special_powers.description: Batmobile can use Outwit, but can only target characters with the Armor, Robot or Vehicle keyword.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: AIRDROP
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Batman Ally team ability or Outsiders team ability.  When Batwing uses the Carry ability, it can place carried characters in any square it moves through during the move.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: OVERWATCH
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Alfred Pennyworth, Batman, Lady Blackhawk, Metamorpho, Nightwing or Red Robin.  When an opposing character 6 or fewer squares from the Batwing deals damage to it or any other friendly character, mark the opposing character with an Overwatch token if it isn't already marked; until the end of your next turn, any friendly character attacking a character marked with an Overwatch token modifies their attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: ROOFTOP SCANNERS
special_powers.description: Modify Batwing's attack value by +1 when targeting characters that can use the Flight ability and characters occupying elevated terrain.

special_powers.name: DIFFICULT TO SPOT
special_powers.description: Invisible Jet modifies its defense value by -1 against ranged combat attacks for each opposing character adjacent to it.

special_powers.name: TAKING COVER BENEATH THE WINGS
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Invisible Jet can use Super Senses but only succeed on a roll of 6; when they use this Super Senses and roll a 1 or 2, after the attack resolves deal Invisible Jet 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: PURPLE RAY REJUVENATION
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Amazon keyword, JSA team ability, or JLA team ability.  When Invisible Jet carries a character, after actions resolve, one carried character who has no action tokens may immediately be given a non-free action this turn.  If you do, give that character a second action token after the action resolves.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: EXTENDED DOME
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Artemis, Donna Troy, Queen Hippolyta, Troia, Wonder Girl or Wonder Woman.  After the resolution of a move action taken by Invisible Jet, it can immediately use Barrier as a free action placing 6 blocking terrain markers instead of 4.  When it does, 2 of the blocking terrain markers must be adjacent to Invisible Jet but not to each other.

special_powers.name: INVISIBLE
special_powers.description: Any character that is 5 or more squares from Invisible Jet can't draw a line of fire to it.

special_powers.name: TAKING COVER BENEATH THE WINGS
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Invisible Jet can use Super Senses but only succeed on a roll of 6; when they use this Super Senses and roll a 1 or 2, after the attack resolves deal Invisible Jet 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: TACTICAL RESPONSE
special_powers.description: GCPD Cruiser can use Perplex, but can only target adjacent characters.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: CLEAR THE STREETS
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Gotham City keyword or Police team ability.  Once per turn, when GCPD Cruiser passes through a square occupied by an opposing character, immediately place that character in a square within 3 squares and line of fire of its current square and deal it 1 damage, then complete GCPD Cruiser's movement.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: CUFFED TO THE BUMPER
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Any character with "GCPD" or "Gordon" in its name.  GCPD Cruiser can use Plasticity; characters that can automatically break away or ignore characters for movement purposes do not automatically break away or ignore GCPD Cruiser for movement purposes.

special_powers.name: TACTICAL RESPONSE
special_powers.description: GCPD Cruiser can use Perplex, but can only target adjacent characters.

special_powers.name: BRINGING IN THE BIG GUNS
special_powers.description: Military Tank can use the Ram ability.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: RANGING IN
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Solder keyword.  Adjacent friendly characters may modify their range value by +1, +2, or +3; when a character modifies its range in this way and actions resolve, roll a d6 and if the result is equal to or less than amount modified, deal Military Tank 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: LET'S TAKE THIS TIN CAN FOR A RIDE
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Sgt. Rock or "Easy Company" in name.  Military Tank can use Willpower. When Military Tank replaces its combat values with the combat values of its pilot, modify any replaced combat value by +1 and when the next non-free action resolves, the pilot may eject from the vehicle instead of being dealt 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: BRINGING IN THE BIG GUNS
special_powers.description: Military Tank can use the Ram ability.

special_powers.name: PILOTED BY GENERAL J.E.B. STUART
special_powers.description: The Haunted Tank is not dealt the 1 unavoidable damage after resolving an action with an attack.

special_powers.name: CLANKETY-CLANKETY-CLANKETY!
special_powers.description: Haunted Tank can use Running Shot and the Ram ability.

special_powers.name: STUKA PATROL! TAKE COVER!
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Haunted Tank can use Toughness; when they are dealt damage, roll a d6 and on a result of 1 deal Haunted Tank 1 damage.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: GENERAL STUART'S COUNSEL
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Soldier keyword. Haunted Tank can use Outwit. Give Haunted Tank a power action and place a hindering terrain marker 6 or fewer squares from the Haunted Tank; all friendly characters occupying or adjacent to the marker modify their attack value by +1; remove the hindering terrain from the battlefield at the beginning of your next turn.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: "JIGSAW TANK" MECHANICS
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Warrior keyword. Haunted Tank can use Support, but it can only target characters with the Vehicle keyword; when it does, modify either the result of the 2d6 roll or the amount healed by +1 for each object adjacent to it. When its printed damage value is 1, Haunted Tank can use Regeneration.

special_powers.name: NICE SHOT, GUS! DIRECT HIT!
special_powers.description: When Haunted Tank uses Energy Explosion, damage dealt to the target of the attack is penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: CLANKETY-CLANKETY-CLANKETY!
special_powers.description: Haunted Tank can use Running Shot and the Ram ability.

special_powers.name: STUKA PATROL! TAKE COVER!
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Haunted Tank can use Toughness; when they are dealt damage, roll a d6 and on a result of 1 deal Haunted Tank 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SKYWIRE
special_powers.description: When The Bug uses the Carry ability friendly characters occupying or adjacent to squares moved through by the Bug can also be carried, even if not adjacent to it at the beginning of its move.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: BEETLE BUILT SOME NICE TRICKS INTO THIS THING
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: JLA team ability or Scientist keyword.  The Bug can use all powers and abilities indicated on the Hazardous Environment dial.  When The Bug would take damage, you may click the Hazardous Environment dial instead.  The Bug is only wrecked when its Piloted dial is knocked out.

special_powers.name: PILOT ABILITY: I KNOW HOW TO KEEP THIS BABY FLYING
special_powers.description: Prerequisites: Blue Beetle or Booster Gold.  The Bug can use all powers and abilities indicated on the Hazardous Environment dial and the Beetle dial.  When The Bug would take damage, you may click either the Hazardous Environment dial or The Beetle dial instead.  The Bug is only wrecked when its Piloted dial is knocked out.

special_powers.name: HAZARDOUS ENVIRONMENT SUPPORT
special_powers.description: Give The Bug a move action and after actions resolve, if The Bug carried at least one friendly character, The Bug can use Support as a free action, modifying the result of the 2d6 roll by +1 for each character carried.

special_powers.name: KEEP IT TOGETHER...
special_powers.description: Immediately after the resolution of a move action, you may heal one of The Bug's other dials of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SKYWIRE
special_powers.description: When The Bug uses the Carry ability friendly characters occupying or adjacent to squares moved through by the Bug can also be carried, even if not adjacent to it at the beginning of its move.

Orange squares are Bat-pole squares. If you are also playing with the Wayne Manor map, you may give a character occupying this square a power action and place that character in the corresponding square on that map. If that square is occupied, place that character in the nearest square it could be placed in.

Orange squares are Lazarus Pit terrain. Lazarus Pit terrain is water terrain. Characters that occupy Lazarus Pit terrain can use Regeneration. A character that heals while occupying Lazarus Pit terrain possesses Battle Fury until it takes damage.
